verses.roman:
rāmera caritra saba,--duḥkhera kāraṇa
svatantra līlāya duḥkha sahena lakṣmaṇa

synonyms: rāmera caritra saba—all the activities of Lord Rāmacandra; duḥkhera kāraṇa—causes of suffering; sva-tantra—although independent; līlāya—in the pastimes; duḥkha—unhappiness; sahena lakṣmaṇa—Lakṣmaṇa tolerates.
translation: The activities of Lord Rāma were full of suffering, but Lakṣmaṇa, of His own accord, tolerated that suffering.
